title: Peach Yogurt Oats
method: Combine oats, milk, yoghurt and flavour ingredients in a jar.
Stir well, cover and refrigerate overnight.
Serve chilled with optional fruit or nuts on top.
swaps: Use certified gluten-free oats if required.
Swap dairy for soy or oat yoghurt to make it dairy-free.
hydrationTip: Pair with a glass of water; oats absorb fluid.
